name: Ricky Iwasaki, omuwandiisi w’ebitabo
title: Yinginiya wa Sofutiweya
summary: Omukugu mu kukola Software, anoonya omukisa omupya okukolera pulojekiti ennene. Oyagala okukola oba okwongerako code abalala basobole okukozesa. Nzikiriza nti obukugu bwange butono bw’ogeraageranya ne yintaneeti, kale njagala nnyo okukola n’ebikozesebwa ebirala, empeereza, ennimi za pulogulaamu.

education.school: Yunivasite y’essaza ly’e California e Fullerton

experience.title: Yinginiya wa Sofutiweya
responsibilities: Yazimba n’okussa mu nkola enkola za web ezisobola okulinnyisibwa nga ekozesa React ne Node.js
Yakolagana n’abaddukanya ebintu okulongoosa ebyetaago n’okulaba nga bituusibwa mu budde
Yakola era n'alabirira RESTful APIs ez'enkola za web
Yakola scripts okukola emirimu mu ngeri ey’otoma n’okutumbula obulungi

experience.title: Omuyambi w’omutendesi wa Tennis
responsibilities: Okusomesa obukodyo bwa ttena mu kibinja ky’abazannyi 5-10
Avunaanyizibwa ku bukuumi bw’abazannyi ku kkooti naddala abazannyi abato n’abakulu, ng’abaana ab’emyaka 3 n’emyaka 60

experience.title: Omukwanaganya ow’ebweru
responsibilities: Okulonda orders eri bakasitoma abali ku yintaneeti
Okutikka order ku loole ezitwala ebintu
Okuyamba bakasitoma okuzuula ebintu mu dduuka
Okukuuma sitoowa nga nnyonjo era nga ntegeke
Okukuuma embeera ennungi era ey’omukwano eri bakasitoma n’abakozi

projects.name: Ekiwandiiko ekiyitibwa Portfolio
projects.description: Omukutu oguddamu ogulaga pulojekiti n’obukugu nga tukozesa tekinologiya w’omukutu ogw’omulembe
